Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_OPTION_VALUES_INS_SP" ( P_OPTION_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_COMPONENT_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_USER_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_VALUE IN VARCHAR2, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1 ) IS V_USER_ID NUMBER := NULL; V_COMPONENT_ID NUMBER := NULL; V_ID NUMBER; BEGIN SELECT CMN_OPTION_VALUES_S1.NEXTVAL INTO V_ID FROM DUAL; IF P_COMPONENT_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN SELECT MAX (ID) INTO V_COMPONENT_ID FROM CMN_COMPONENTS WHERE COMPONENT_CODE = P_COMPONENT_CODE; END IF; IF P_USER_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN SELECT MAX (ID) INTO V_USER_ID FROM CMN_SEC_USERS WHERE USER_NAME = P_USER_NAME; END IF; INSERT INTO CMN_OPTION_VALUES ( ID, OPTION_ID, COMPONENT_ID, USER_ID, VALUE, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) SELECT V_ID, O.ID, V_COMPONENT_ID, V_USER_ID, P_VALUE, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY FROM CMN_OPTIONS O WHERE OPTION_CODE = P_OPTION_CODE; END;
